apiValue.shortdesc: The value of this key is a String that represents the bundle ID of the app that made the request.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The value of this key is a String that represents the bundle ID of the app that made the request. iOS only.

apiValue.shortdesc: The value of this key is a String containing the URL to open.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The value of this key is a String containing the URL to open. iOS only.

apiValue.shortdesc: Sets the minimum version of the android app installed on the receiving device.

apiDesc.p: Sets the minimum version of the android app installed on the receiving device. If this minimum version is not installed then the install flow will be triggered. Note that the version code should not be zero.

apiValue.shortdesc: Sets the text shown on the email invitation button to install the app.

apiDesc.p: Sets the text shown on the email invitation button to install the app. Default install text used if not set. Maximum length is 32 characters.
Sets an image for invitations. The imageURI is required to be in absolute format. The URI can be either a content URI with extension "jpg" or "png", or a network url with scheme "https".

apiValue.shortdesc: Sets the deepLink for the invitation.

apiDesc.p: Sets the deepLink for the invitation. |deepLink| is an identifier that your app defines for use across all supported platforms. It will be passed with the invitation to the receiver. You can use it to present customized view when the user receives an invitation in your app.

apiValue.shortdesc: Sets the HTML-formatted (UTF-8 encoded, no JavaScript) content for invites sent through email.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Sets the HTML-formatted (UTF-8 encoded, no JavaScript) content for invites sent through email. Android only.

apiValue.shortdesc: Sets the subject for invites sent by email.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Sets the subject for invites sent by email. Android only.

apiValue.shortdesc: Sets the default message to use for the invitation.

apiDesc.p: Sets the default message to use for the invitation. This is the message that will be sent in the invite, for e.g., via SMS or email. This message must not exceed 100 characters. The message will be modifiable by the user. Maximum length is 100 characters.

apiValue.shortdesc: App Invite requires defining the client ID if the invite is received on a different platform than iOS.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: App Invite requires defining the client ID if the invite is received on a different platform than iOS.

apiValue.shortdesc: Sets the title of the navigation bar of the invite dialog.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Sets the title of the navigation bar of the invite dialog.
